This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library('tidyverse')
library('chron')
library('resample')
library('ggplot2')
library('boot')
library('scales')


dados = read_csv('github-users-committing-filetypes.csv')

dados <- dados %>% mutate(data = sprintf("%d-%d-%d", the_year, the_month, month_day)) %>% filter(complete.cases(dados))

amostra = dados %>% filter(file_extension == 'go') %>% mutate(is_weekend = is.weekend(data))

pop <- function(x,i){
  d = x[i,]
  mean_week = d %>% filter(!is_weekend) %>% summarise(media = mean(users)) 
  mean_weekend = d %>% filter(is_weekend) %>% summarise(media = mean(users)) 
  return(mean_week$media/mean_weekend$media)
}

desvio_fds <- function(x, i){
  
  d = x[i,]
  d_sd = d %>% filter(is_weekend)
  return(sd(d_sd$users))
}

b_pop = boot(amostra, pop, 5000)
boot.ci(b_pop, conf = 0.95, type = "bca")

b_sd = boot(amostra, desvio_fds, 5000)
boot.ci(b_sd, conf = 0.95, type = "bca")


b_mean = bootstrap(amostra, mean(users), 5000) %>% CI.bca(probs = c(.025, .975))



```
